content.raw:
I don't have a good way (yet), beside using world_name information, to specify a configuration per simulation runner. I don't believe it's urgent right now, but is something we should handle in the future. There is an asana task in blueprint for this.

The scoped name issue is also something that @scpeters  is interested in, related to SDF. We can tackle this first thing into the Blueprint development, again there is a new asana task.
content.html:
I don't have a good way (yet), beside using world_name information, to specify a configuration per simulation runner. I don't believe it's urgent right now, but is something we should handle in the future. There is an asana task in blueprint for this.

The scoped name issue is also something that @scpeters is interested in, related to SDF. We can tackle this first thing into the Blueprint development, again there is a new asana task.
